law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. VI, sec. 616, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 298, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1984. -- Amended 1980 ch. 183, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Local district requirements to be set by administrative regulation to implement program.
